entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 12:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: NE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow or ice pellets beginning before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain or rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
